title: HPLC #2 High Backpressure Issue
content: System is showing unusually high backpressure even after column change. May need maintenance.

title: Centrifuge Making Unusual Noise
content: The centrifuge is making a loud grinding noise during operation. I've stopped using it and tagged it as out of service.

title: Centrifuge Repair Update
content: Service technician has been scheduled for next Tuesday to repair the centrifuge.

title: UV-Vis Calibration Issue
content: The UV-Vis spectrophotometer was showing incorrect readings. It has been recalibrated and is now working properly.
